TextView.android:text:
Login Screen - Lets the user login to the application. The user should have valid USC id and password. 
 
Profile - Has student percent attendance and the marks obtained in quiz.
 
Check-in - Lets the user check-in to the class.
 
Registered courses - Has the information of the courses of the courses the student is currently enrolled in. 
 
Quiz - Lets the student take up the quiz given by the Professor.
 
Locate Class - Shows the location of class on the USC map.
 
Logout - Lets the student logout of the application.
 
About Us - Has information about the application makers
